tool.name: histories
tool.command:
parsec histories update_dataset "$history_id" "$dataset_id"
#if $annotation: --annotation "$annotation" #end if #if $deleted: $deleted #end if #if $genome_build: --genome_build "$genome_build" #end if #if $name: --name "$name" #end if #if $visible: $visible #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: annotation
param.label: Annotation
param.help: Replace history dataset annotation with given string

param.name: deleted
param.label: Deleted
param.help: Mark or unmark history dataset as deleted

param.name: name
param.label: Name
param.help: Replace history dataset name with the given string

param.name: visible
param.label: Visible
param.help: Mark or unmark history dataset as visible

tool.help: Update history dataset metadata. Some of the attributes that can be modified are documented below.
